title: Gentlemen prefer blondes (Captioned)
creator_credit: Howard Hawks, Sol Siegel and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
brief_description: Two showgirls go to Paris in search of rich husbands in this musical comedy which is memorable for the score and songs such as “Diamonds are a girl’s best friend” Starring Marilyn Monroe, Jane Russel and Charles Coburn. Based on the novel by Anita Loos.
